content: उत्ताल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Great, strong; अनुत्तालतालवृंतवात <ls>K. 251.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Violent, loud (as sound); <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 31.</ls> ({%b%}) Roaring, gusty (wind); <ls>Māl. 5. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Formidable, terrific, fierce; उत्तालास्त इमे गभीरपयसः पुण्याः सरित्संगमाः <ls>U. 2. 30</ls>; °तुमुल <ls>U. 6</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 68</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 11</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 5.">23.</ls> {@--4@} Huge, of monstrous shape; °ताडका <ls>Mv. 1. 37.</ls> {@--5@} Arduous, difficult. {@--6@} Manifest; distinctly visible; <ls>Śi. 18. 54.</ls> {@--7@} Speedy, swift. {@--8@} Best, excellent; <ls>Śi. 12. 31.</ls> {@--9@} Elevated, lofty, tall; <ls>Śi. 3. 80.</ls> --लः An ape. --लं A particular number.
